definition: To perform a repetitive physical action, typically involving the movement of limbs or body parts, in order to generate a rhythmic motion or force, often used in the context of exercising or operating machinery.

examples.english: I pump up my bicycle tires.

examples.german: Die Maschine pumpt Wasser aus dem Keller.
examples.english: The machine pumps water out of the basement.
He pumps weights at the gym.
The heart pump supports heart function.

examples.german: Der Ballon pumpt sich langsam auf.
